v8:item.v8:content: Please, refresh a newly added accounts.
Choose "Offline" if you plan to download transactions manually via CSV files
Please, choose bank of the account
Please, choose the account type from the list below or create a new one:
The refresh failed. Try to repeat operation

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogBankAccounts.Ref, CatalogBankAccounts.DeletionMark, CatalogBankAccounts.Owner, CatalogBankAccounts.Code, CatalogBankAccounts.Description, CatalogBankAccounts.ItemID, CatalogBankAccounts.ItemAccountID, CatalogBankAccounts.AccountType, CatalogBankAccounts.CurrentBalance, CatalogBankAccounts.AvailableBalance, CatalogBankAccounts.LastUpdatedTimeUTC, CatalogBankAccounts.LastUpdateAttemptTimeUTC, CatalogBankAccounts.NextUpdateTimeUTC, CatalogBankAccounts.RefreshStatusCode, CatalogBankAccounts.Predefined, CatalogBankAccounts.PredefinedDataName, CAST("" AS STRING) AS Status, CatalogBankAccounts.YodleeAccount FROM Catalog.BankAccounts AS CatalogBankAccounts WHERE (CatalogBankAccounts.Owner = &Bank OR &Bank = VALUE(Catalog.Banks.EmptyRef))
